author: hindessm
msg: Remove src jars from the jre as suggested by Tim during the last

author: elecharny
msg: o Modify the eagerlyPopulateFields to throw a LdapNoSuchObjectException if the entry does not exist
o Removed spurious lookups for the rename operation
o Removed a check for existence in the Exception interceptor, the check is already done in the eagerlyPopulateFields
o The MODIFIERS_NAME_AT and MODIFY_TIMESTAMP_AT operational attributes are now added directly into the renamed entry, in order to guarantee that the modification is atomic
o The modifications are applied to the read entrain the SchemaInterceptor, instead of being done by the store
o The Store API rename method now takes a forth parameter : the modified entry

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-566.  Java: fix so that JAVA_HOME is bound by build.xml for test_tools.sh.

author: cutting
msg: formatting only: wrap lines longer than 80 columns

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1806] correct assembly descriptor to include filesets/fileset under moduleSet/sources.  Otherwise get dupl artifacts inside assemblies.
